## wordpack doc

generate documentation for wordpack

### Synopsis

generate documentation for wordpack in several formats

  valid formats are:
    * man (default)
    * markdown, md

```
wordpack doc [format] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for doc
```

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.wordpack.yaml)
